metadata.name: Process Reconnaissance Via Wmic.EXE
metadata.comment: Detects the execution of "wmic" with the "process" flag, which adversary might use to list processes running on the compromised host or list installed software hotfixes and patches.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\wmic.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('wmic.exe') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('process')) AND NOT (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('call')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('create'))))

output.summary: Detects the execution of "wmic" with the "process" flag, which adversary might use to list processes running on the compromised host or list installed software hotfixes and patches.
